citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
One bottle of injectable Thiamine was found with an expiration date of October 2020 and one bottle of injectable Vitamin
B12 was found with an expiration date of March 2020. Expired medication can lose potency and might not be as effective.
This may cause adverse effects in the animals. The facility must ensure that all medications are within date and properly
stored.
*********Correct by August 20, 2021

In the large barn a vertical 4x4 post was broken exposing numerous large nails. In the same pen a metal gate was on the
ground in the area where the sheep were housed. Lastly, in the adjacent pen there was jagged and bunched wire
observed in with the sheep. These conditions could lead to injury of the animals. The facility must maintain enclosures in
good repair.
******Correct by September 1, 2021
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
One bottle of injectable Thiamine was found with an expiration date of October 2020 and one bottle of injectable Vitamin 
B12 was found with an expiration date of March 2020. Expired medication can lose potency and might not be as effective.  
This may cause adverse effects in the animals. The facility must ensure that all medications are within date and properly 
stored. 
*********Correct by August 20, 2021 
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
In the large barn a vertical 4x4 post was broken exposing numerous large nails.  In the same pen a metal gate was on the 
ground in the area where the sheep were housed.  Lastly, in the adjacent pen there was jagged and bunched wire 
observed in with the sheep.  These conditions could lead to injury of the animals. The facility must maintain enclosures in 
good repair. 
******Correct by September 1, 2021 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.

End Section
